1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    abCoxBuild,
8    abCoxCalc,
9    abCoxFill,
10    abCoxIrrep,
11    abCoxPosition,
12    abCoxPrefix,
13    abCoxReduce,
14    abCoxSyntax,
15
16    -- * Message
17    ambInfixes,
18    lackArg,
19    unkCop,
20    unkCox,
21    unkGlobalVar,
22    unkRefVar,
23    unkShow,
24    unkTerm,
25    unmatchBlank,
26
27    -- * Utility
28    detailTermRel,
29    msgTerms2,
30  ) where
31
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                 as B
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax               as S
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type            as D
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Message       as Msg
36
37
38-- --------------------------------------------  Abortable scope
39
40-- | Abortable scope for cox building.
41abCoxBuild :: S.TTree -> B.MapAb b
42abCoxBuild = Msg.abortableTree "cox-build"
43
44-- | Abortable scope for cox calculation.
45abCoxCalc :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
46abCoxCalc = B.abortable "cox-calc"
47
48-- | Abortable scope for cox filling.
49abCoxFill :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
50abCoxFill = B.abortable "cox-fill"
51
52-- | Abortable scope for irreducible expression.
53abCoxIrrep :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
54abCoxIrrep = B.abortable "cox-irrep"
55
56-- | Abortable scope for cox position.
57abCoxPosition :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
58abCoxPosition = B.abortable "cox-position"
59
60-- | Abortable scope for cox prefix.
61abCoxPrefix :: S.TTree -> B.MapAb b
62abCoxPrefix = Msg.abortableTree "cox-prefix"
63
64-- | Abortable scope for cox reduction.
65abCoxReduce :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> B.MapAb b
66abCoxReduce = B.abortable "cox-reduce"
67
68-- | Abortable scope for cox syntax.
69abCoxSyntax :: S.TTree -> B.MapAb b
70abCoxSyntax = Msg.abortableTree "cox-syntax"
71
72
73-- --------------------------------------------  Message
74
75-- | Ambiguous infix operators
76ambInfixes :: [String] -> B.Ab a
77ambInfixes = Left . B.abortLines "Ambiguous infix operators"
78
79-- | Lack of argument
80lackArg :: String -> B.Ab a
81lackArg = Left . B.abortLine "Lack of argument"
82
83-- | Unknown content operator
84unkCop :: String -> B.Ab a
85unkCop = Left . B.abortLine "Unknown content operator"
86
87-- | Unknown expression
88unkCox :: String -> B.Ab a
89unkCox = Left . B.abortLine "Unknown expression"
90
91-- | Unknown global variable
92unkGlobalVar :: String -> B.Ab a
93unkGlobalVar = Left . B.abortLine "Unknown global variable"
94
95-- | Unknown reference for variable
96unkRefVar :: (String, Int) -> [String] -> B.Ab a
97unkRefVar (v, k) vs = Left $ B.abortLines "Unknown reference for variable"
98                [ "look up " ++ var (v, k)
99                , "in " ++ args vs ]
100
101-- | Unknown object
102unkShow :: (Show x) => x -> B.Ab a
103unkShow x = Left $ B.abortLines "Unknown object" $ lines $ show x
104
105-- | Unknown term name
106unkTerm :: (D.GetTermNames t1, D.GetTermNames t2) => t1 -> t2 -> B.Ab a
107unkTerm t1 t2 =
108    Left $ B.abortLines "Unknown term name"
109         $ msgTerms2 "Unknown" t1 "in the terms" t2
110
111-- | Unmatch blank (bug)
112unmatchBlank :: String -> Int -> String -> [String] -> B.Ab a
113unmatchBlank v k _ vs =
114    Left $ B.abortLines "Unmatch blank (bug)"
115           [ "look up " ++ var (v, k)
116           , "in " ++ args vs ]
117
118
119-- ----------------------  Utility
120
121var :: (String, Int) -> String
122var (v, k) = v ++ "/" ++ show k
123
124args :: [String] -> String
125args vs = unwords $ map var $ zip vs [1..]
126
127-- | Terms and input relation heading.
128detailTermRel :: String -> [S.TermName] -> D.Head -> [String]
129detailTermRel label ns he1 = detail where
130    detail = [label] ++ indentLines ns' ++ ["Input relation"] ++ indentLines ns1
131    ns'    = map S.showTermName ns
132    ns1    = linesFrom $ D.headExplain he1
133
134linesFrom :: (Show a) => a -> [String]
135linesFrom = lines . show
136
137-- | Create message lines from double term names.
138msgTerms2 :: (D.GetTermNames t1, D.GetTermNames t2) => String -> t1 -> String -> t2 -> [String]
139msgTerms2 s1 t1 s2 t2 = detail where
140    detail = [s1] ++ msg1 t1 ++ [s2] ++ msg2 t2
141    msg1 = indentLines . B.sort . showTermNames
142    msg2 = indentLines . B.sort . showTermNames
143
144-- | Indent message lines.
145indentLines :: [String] -> [String]
146indentLines = map ("  " ++)
147
148-- | Lines of term names.
149showTermNames :: (D.GetTermNames t) => t -> [String]
150showTermNames = msg . D.getTermNames where
151    msg [] = ["(no terms)"]
152    msg ns = map S.showTermName ns
153
